body.name: Smart Ring for Women Answer/Make Call, 1.32" Smartwatch Gifts with Blood Oxygen/Heart Rate/Sleep Monitor, IP68 Waterproof Fitness Tracker Step Calorie Counter Pedometer Workout Watch for Android iOS
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 46 mins
features: 📞【Hands-Free Calls & Smart Notifications】Liberate hands with the smart watch and make calls from your own wrist. With a built-in speaker and microphone, calls become easy to make, whether you're exercising outdoors or tidying up at home. Once paired with your phone, you can make, receive and reject calls and view call logs directly on the smart watch for women. Stay connected to SMS and APP messages(Text, Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Twitter, etc.), never miss any important information.

🏃【Activity Tracker & 100+ Sports Modes】Embark on a journey of 100+ sports modes (walking, running, cycling, football...) with this fitness tracker. From indoor to outdoor activities, this smartwatch has it all. The fitness watch keeps an accurate record of your activities throughout the day and can track a variety of real-time data such as calories, distance, steps, etc., empowering you to conquer your aspirations and redefine your limits. It is the perfect choice for fitness enthusiasts.

💖【Health Monitor & Women Health Care】Smart watch for android phones with advanced sensors provide insights to help you better understand your health and make a reasonable adjustment on your lifestyle. Keep an eye on your health metrics (24-hour heart rate, blood oxygen and sleep). Tailored to women's unique needs, it adeptly records female menstrual periods, personalizes menstrual management and pregnancy preparation reminders for women. Making your health a priority like never before.

⌚【Colorful Visuals & Customised Watch】The Best Combination of Style and Functionality. High-quality metal frame with 1.32-inch HD color display and 2.5D curved glass provides you with a more vivid and wider view. The screen resolution of 360*360 ensures every detail is rendered with pristine clarity. With the app connected, there are a variety of beautiful dials to choose from. You can also use your favorite photo as the background of your screensaver, such as your family, pets, idols.

☔【Multifunctional Smartwatch & IP68 Waterproof】Experience the pinnacle of convenience with our smartwatch – Music controller, camera control, weather, breathing training, phone search, alarm clock, timer, stopwatch, etc. With an IP68 waterproof rating, this running watch is your dependable companion for swimming and water sports. It's designed to conquer sweat and dust, ensuring its durability and reliability even during intense workouts

🎁【The Best Gift to Give】The watch takes less than 2 hours to fully charge and can last up to 8 days, providing you with a seamless experience. Bright color soft band and fashion design make it an excellent present for parents and children on various festive occasions. It's the best gift for birthdays, everyday gift giving, Bar Mitzvah, Christmas, New Year, Valentine's Day, Father's Day, Mother's Day, Graduation, etc. Elevate gifting to a whole new level with this android smart watch.

🎉【Experience Exceptional Service】Tensky smart watch with text and call works seamlessly with most iOS 12.0+ & Android 6.0+ smartphones(Not for PC, iPad, and Tablets). We are committed to providing you with smart wearable devices and prioritizing your experience and comfort. We offer 1-year warranty, if you have any questions or failures in use, please do not hesitate to contact us directly. We are always ready to provide you with the most satisfactory solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Smartwatch inexpensive
reviews.reviewText: I like it as it is smaller than other smartwatches so it doesnt look so dominant. It is easily connected to Google Fit to track health indicators. It is easy to use, has good connectivity to my Samsung and is sturdy for outdoor activities. I check pulse,steps and pulseox often. Tracks sleep very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this watch.
reviews.reviewText: Overall I'm really pleased with this watch. I've had it for a couple months now and it works great. I basically got it for message notifications at work. It does a good job of displaying the entire text or fb message. Battery stays charged for about a week.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This watch is perfect for those who do not wish to pay hundreds of dollars for other more advertised smartwatches. The watch has many features and uses which are pretty decent for the price. I also love the magnetic charging cable. The look of the watch is attractive and not overwhelming on the wrist. Not sure how the health readings compare to the more expensive devices, but at this price point you will probably have to allow for less pinpoint accuracy. The company warns you not to wear the rubberized band too tight as it will irritate your skin. You will need to keep band a bit loose to allow your skin to breathe. Once established on trial and error, you should have no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top Notch Watch
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a watch and it didn't work too well. I immediately contacted support, and received a replacement without delay. My new watch works perfectly & beautifully. Beats any $400+ watch on the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good watch for decent price
reviews.reviewText: It's very easy to use and and I like that it was affordable price and my husband loved his! I love the black color because it will go with anything you wear :) it was very easy to connect to my phone and gives me all my notifications and phone calls :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice, but hard to use
reviews.reviewText: Some time ago I bought an Amazfit 5 band. I wanted something a bit fancier, so I bought this. It looks good, although the generic face looks childish. It took more than a dozen attempts over a night and the next day to get the watch to "bond" (sinc) with the watch. It took a half-dozen attempts to get the watch to accept a programming update it wanted.App wants to link to the watch by scanning QR code on the watch, but there is no such code on the watch (or instruction on how to find it.).Program requires full access (constant) to my location or it won't record my exercise. I believe they intend to sell this information (along with my contacts and other information). That makes the watch largely useless because I don't want to be tracked all day every day and I don't want my contacts to be inundated with advertisements or worse.Watch is supposed to be able to help "find" my phone, but I find no instructions, so I assume it cannot actually do this.Instructions in the booklet are in font so small as to be practically illegible."App" (program) instructions to "bind" (link) watch to phone refer to functions that do not exist on my Android phone. The directions on the "app" for connecting the phone and app are thoroughly confusing.Yesterday I walked a one mile course during the lunch hour but the app claims I only went 702 steps. The watch admits I went over 4,000 steps

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok watch but not reliable
reviews.reviewText: I bought this watch mostly to monitor my heart rate during workouts and tracking calories. It did an so so job. When I really got into it the watch was not registering heart rate anymore. Also - trying to do anything else with the watch while working out - not possible. You can only stop the workout, read your notification and then start a new workout. That totally throws off any data you might want to collect.The other thing that was very annoying to me is the fact that there are 4 watch faces in the watch memory. You can only add one extra watch face. I wanted a different watch face for sleeping (less bright, minimal) and a watch face with bigger letters to actually read my heart rate and steps. Not possible. Just one extra.The sedentary reminder was a joke. I just sat back down at my desk after walking around and it gave me a reminder to move. Eh. I just did. That happened over and over again.Sleep tracking was somewhat off too. If you wake up in the morning and you check your phone for 30 minutes - you were still sleeping according to the watch. When I wanted to track sleep accurately I used to wave my arm up and down a couple of times when I was awake and then check my phone, to make sure it knew I was awake ;-PNotification for messages and phone worked but were not useful to me other than having to get out my phone to see what it was actually saying or who was actually calling. The message doesn't show all the way and the phone numbers only show up if you sync your address book.In spite of saying it was somewhat small the watch felt really big on me and too much of an intrusion in my daily life. I returned it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great watch for the price
reviews.reviewText: Simple round design, not overly common with smart watches. Also the various background options give you a lot to choose from.

Vengo de una mi band 7 pro y este nada que envidiar, es rápido buena pantalla aún que más grosor y ancho para muñecas grandes. Pero Alexa funciona bien y te habla así como puedes llamar a los contactos y funciona bien esperemos que resista al agua ya que este lleva altavoz. Pero lo veo buena compra y más barato de la mi band

Ho ricevuto il mio smartwatch a Natale e lo indosso sempre. È un ottimo prodotto. Ha molte funzioni utili e la batteria è di lunga durata. All'inizio ho avuto un piccolo problema di connessione ma subito risolto. Preciso ed affidabile durante le attività quotidiane e anche per monitorare il sonno. Ottimo prodotto, lo consiglio!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Multi-fonctionnalité et durée de la charge
reviews.reviewText: Il y a plusieurs bonnes raisons de choisir cette montre.La première d'entre elles est le niveau de fonctionnalité pour le prix payé. Vous disposerez de nombreuses fonctions très utiles, notamment le suivi de la santé, les applications sportives, le suivi des appels téléphoniques et des SMS, ainsi que le contrôle à distance des appareils musicaux grâce à Bluetooth et Alexa. Tout cela pour un prix très modeste.Et la charge - en fonction de l'utilisation bien sûr - peut durer jusqu'à une semaine, contrairement à d'autres appareils bien plus coûteux.En outre, il existe également un large choix d'habillages de montres.Le support technique est facilement disponible, par email : à la fois rapide et très détaillé.Je suis extrêmement satisfait de ce produit et le recommande vivement.

Ich bin mit dieser Smartwatch mehr als zufrieden. Sehr viele verschiedene Features, die man gut nutzen kann. Die Akkulaufzeit ist sehr stark. Alles in allem eine gelungene Smartchwatch, die ich empfehlen kann.Das Preisleistungsverhältis ist sehr gut!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Fantastique❤️ Très beau et fonctionne bien!
reviews.reviewText: Super montre, très bonne qualité, toutes les fonctions sont disponibles, tout peut être utilisé, le son est très clair, l'apparence est parfaite, l'écran tactile est super pratique mais un peu fragile.Je suis très satisfait de la fonction, la mesure est très précise, la batterie est très durable, elle peut répondre aux appels, il y a 100 modes de sport et mesure automatiquement la santé physique quotidienne.La montre est très beau avec un superbe design, de très bonne qualité et luxueuse.Y a rien à dire pour le prix c'est très correct.Je suis très satisfait de la montre et je le recommande d'acheter à tous les hommes qui cherchent un cadeau à offrir pour sa femme, sa maman, sa sœur ou à une amie etc....
